content: Sixth Cabinet of Singapore**This article has multiple issues.** Please help **improve it** or discuss these issues on the **talk page**. *(Learn how and when to remove these messages)*This article **possibly contains original research**. Please improve it by verifying the claims made and adding inline citations. Statements consisting only of original research should be removed. *(June 2017)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Sixth Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Sixth Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet** is the sixth [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore). Formed by [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore) [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew) on 6 January 1981 following the [1980 general election](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election), it governed Singapore until its dissolution on 1 January 1985. ## Cabinet The Sixth Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet consisted of the following members.
